text: Alonso Llano Ruiz (June 19, 1931 - March 26, 2015) was a Colombian Roman Catholic bishop. Ordained to the priesthood in 1973, Llano Ruiz was appointed bishop of the Diocese of Istmina-Tadó, Colombia and retired in 2010.Alonso Llano Ruiz ==See also== ==Notes== Category:1931 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Colombian Roman Catholic bishops
title: Alonso Llano Ruiz
